name: mewtwonite-x
effect: Held: Allows Mewtwo to Mega Evolve into Mega Mewtwo X.
short_effect: Held: Allows Mewtwo to Mega Evolve into Mega Mewtwo X.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
One variety of the mysterious Mega Stones.
Have Mewtwo hold it, and this stone will
enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
